definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: I think of Nelson Mandela, who has spent his life upholding the rights of others.
sentences.chinese: 我认为纳尔逊曼德拉，她用毕生维护他人的权利。

sentences.english: This painting represents Nelson dying at Trafalgar.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画描绘了特拉法加战役中的纳尔逊。

sentences.english: Xiao LAN at once with Pan Hu white three in each hotel looking for the whereabouts of nelson.
sentences.chinese: 萧岚立刻便与潘虎白三在各个酒店查找纳尔逊的下落。

sentences.english: Xiao LAN to find records the foreigner on thin, his name is nelson.
sentences.chinese: 萧岚找到记录薄上那个外国人，他的名字叫纳尔逊。

sentences.english: Admiral nelson was a naval officer.
sentences.chinese: 纳尔逊上将是个海军军官。

sentences.english: Nelson always had baobab leaves for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 纳尔逊的早餐是猴面包树叶子。

sentences.english: Three years ago Mr. Nelson went to another town that was at longitude 24 degrees east.
sentences.chinese: 三年前纳尔逊先生去了位于东经24度的另一个城镇。

sentences.english: Was the son of Nelson Rockefeller really eaten by cannibals?
sentences.chinese: 是纳尔逊洛克菲勒的儿子真的被食人族吃了吗？

sentences.english: I decided to add Nelson and a marine officer to my quarterdeck.
sentences.chinese: 我决定购买纳尔逊和海军官员到我的后甲板。

sentences.english: There is a statue of Nelson in Trafalgar Square.
sentences.chinese: 在特拉法加广场有一尊纳尔逊的塑像。

sentences.english: Mr. Nelson could not go home often.
sentences.chinese: 纳尔逊先生不能常常回家。

definition: Guiseppe Garibaldi (1807-1882), Italian military commander and politician
